        tile - the tile to check.
        index - the index to check.
        neighbours - the neighbours to check.

      • checkPermutation

        public static boolean checkPermutation(Tile tile,
                                       int index,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.Character> neighbours,
                                       Board copy,
                                       int rotation)
        Checks the permutation identified by the given tile, index and rotation to see if it is valid.
        Parameters:
        tile - the tile to check.
        index - the index to check.
        neighbours - the neighbours to check.
        copy - a copy of the current state of the board.
        rotation - the rotation to check.
        Returns:
        true if the permuation is valid, false otherwise.
